description.verify:
In order to get access to this Server, you will have to complete a quick verification to lower the risk of Bot attacks and to ensure overhaul security {emote}

Please note the Admins and Mods of {guild} do not have access to any of your provided information.
description.premium:
Thank you for being an Enterprise member and supporting this project {emote}

Note that you do not need to pass the verification in {guild} as skipping verification is part of your Enterprise plan.
